title: OpenAI Plugin using `gpt-4-vision-preview` model leading to 404 error
body:
**Describe the bug**
Using `gpt-4-vision-preview` model to analyze images in the openai plugin (around line 404 in `plugin-openai/src/index.ts`) is leading to the below error. The `gpt-4-vision` model appears to be deprecated. Changing the model definition to `gpt-4o` or `gpt-4o-mini` resolves the error.

```
[2025-04-07 16:04:09] ERROR: Error analyzing image:
    message: "(Error) OpenAI API error: 404"
    stack: [
      "Error: OpenAI API error: 404",
      "at IMAGE_DESCRIPTION (.../node_modules/@elizaos/plugin-openai/dist/index.js:782:17)",
      "at process.processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:105:5)",
      "at async AgentRuntime.useModel (.../node_modules/@elizaos/cli/dist/chunk-2I224C7C.js:46786:22)",
      "at async TwitterInteractionClient.handleTweet .../node_modules/@elizaos/plugin-twitter/dist/index.js:8169:29)",
      "at async TwitterInteractionClient.processMentionTweets (.../node_modules/@elizaos/plugin-twitter/dist/index.js:8016:9)",
      "at async TwitterInteractionClient.handleTwitterInteractions (.../node_modules/@elizaos/plugin-twitter/dist/index.js:7909:7)"
    ]
```

<!-- A clear and concise description of what the bug is. -->

**To Reproduce**

<!-- Steps to reproduce the behavior. -->

**Expected behavior**

comments.author: github-actions
comments.body: Hello @LongJeongS! Welcome to the elizaOS community. Thank you for opening your first issue; we appreciate your contribution. You are now an elizaOS contributor!
